title: Triple F aka Fun Fact Friday + Gen Z Slang + The “Driveway Theory” + Easy Trivia & More!
itunes:title: Triple F aka Fun Fact Friday + Gen Z Slang + The “Driveway Theory” + Easy Trivia & More!
description:
Amy will drop some knowledge on you today in the form of ‘Fun Fact Friday.’ Someone on the show thinks they’re well versed in classical music, we’ll find out about the ‘driveway theory,’ and fill your day with a bunch of positivity by spreading the love in Tell Me Something Good! Happy Friday!

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
